title: Robert Finlay (rugby union)
text:
Robert Finlay (9 April 1923 – 8 October 1979) was a <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Rugby Union career.
Amateur career.
Finlay played for <a href="Watsonian%20FC">Watsonians</a>.
Provincial career.
He was capped by <a href="Edinburgh%20District%20%28rugby%20union%29">Edinburgh District</a> to play against <a href="Glasgow%20District%20%28rugby%20union%29">Glasgow District</a> in the inter-city match of 1947.
International career.
He was <a href="Cap%20%28sport%29%23Rugby%20union">capped</a> once for <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> in 1948.
